title: Pennysplit
description: A very simple, no email, no registration group expense splitting app. Just enter the details, split and share.

title: Photo Mosaic
description: Python program to generate a image by replacing the pixels of the picture with smaller images(mosaic).

title: Rating Generation and Auto Summarization
description: Rating Generation and Auto-summarization using NLP techniques on Amazon Fine Food Reviews dataset(Kaggle).

title: Twitter on Map
description: An android app to visualize twitter data on Google Maps with features like heat map and location based tag cloud.

title: Course Helper
description: To help students of IITK in choosing the right courses with recommendations during registration in order to optimally complete their degree.

title: Blog Scraper
description: Tool to scrape useful data from a blog or blogger website (mainly focused on travel blogs).

title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
description: Analyzed sentiment of tweets as positive, negative or neutral with data of around 50 thousand tweets from India.
